name: Slime Knight (LuisMLC)
description:
Inside the abandoned castle in the town of Aluren, a looming threat stirs... The Slime King is building his slime army to conquer the town and erradicate all its population. Fortunately a brave adventurer appears to put an end to the evil Slime King's plans and save the town of Aluren from its iminent doom!

Do you have what it takes to defeat the Slime King for good on this metroidvania 2D platformer?

Adventure through the castle with the help of consumables and power ups provided by a mysterious wizard to defeat the Slime King.
